name: qJump
description:
Experience the oldschool strafe jumping action of quake and others!

Improve your technique to get the lowest time possible!

Compete with your friends in multiplayer! (No punch through, requires an open port)

Current record is: 00:06:63

If you can beat it, post video proof and I'll update it here.

This is a very early WiP prototype, I have many things to add and even more things to fix.

Update 12/3/18: There's now slight headbob to more closely mimic Quake.
